sources.name: dsproductcsv
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~>  dsproductcsv

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared dsproductcsv = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.DataLakeContents("https://saadl.dfs.core.windows.net/democontainer/SalesData.csv"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]),
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true])
in
  PromotedHeaders;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = dsproductcsv,
  #"Uppercased text" = Table.TransformColumns(Source, {{"Sales Channel", each Text.Upper(_), type text}}),
  #"Changed column type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Uppercased text", {{"Unit Cost", type number}})
in
  #"Changed column type";
